info.name: CloudComputeCannon API
info.description: A collection of API calls showing common usage of the cloud-compute-cannon API.

request.description: Run a "turbo" job. "Turbo" means that data will not be persisted (to e.g. S3), and that the request only returns when the job is done. Designed for jobs where response time is paramount, or when computes are cheap and storage is not required.
Adds a persisted job to the queue.
Lists counts of bull job queues.
